name: Out of the Biting Wind
description:
Okay, so maybe deciding to hike the mountain trails with a storm brewing wasn't the smartest move. And, yes, you clearly took a wrong turn somewhere in the fading light. Maybe you should even have listened to the cryptic warnings of the superstitious locals.

Luckily, you found an abandoned building to take shelter in as the temperature drops. Sure, it looks a bit run down, but maybe you can get a fire going. At any rate, at least you'll be out of the biting wind.

--------------------------------------------

Main Keys
W A S D - movement
Shift - sprint

Other Keys
ESC - pause (then X to Exit)
F8-F9 - adjust brightness
F12 - toggle fullscreen
